alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 19 at 9:03AM CDT until March 22 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama...Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...From this evening to Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Low lying pastures will flood. Cattle should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:05 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 14.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 18.3 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
